front.title: BGP SR Policy Extensions for Path Scheduling

abstract.t: Segment Routing (SR) policy enables instantiation of an ordered list of segments with a specific intent for traffic steering. When using SR policy in a a network with time-variant characterics or requires high resources utilization efficiency, delivering the time-variant information associated with paths is necessary. This document proposes extensions to BGP SR Policy to deliver the schedule time information of candidate paths and segment lists.
